tool.name: Creates yaml for pm_muairs
tool.command:
printf "poisson_r: $poisson_r 
name: $struct_name 
charged: $charged 
geom_steps: $geom_steps 
vdw_scale: $vdw_scale 
calculator: $calculator_cond.calculator 
geom_force_tol: $geom_force_tol 
clustering_method: $clustering_method 
clustering_hier_t: $clustering_hier_t 
out_folder: $out_folder 
">outputx.yaml && echo $calculator_cond.calculator && #if str($calculator_cond.calculator)=="uep": printf "uep_gw_factor: $calculator_cond.uep_gw_factor 
uep_chden: $calculator_cond.uep_chden 
">>outputx.yaml && #else if str($calculator_cond.calculator)=="castep": printf "castep_command: $calculator_cond.castep_command 
castep_param: $calculator_cond.castep_param 
mu_symbol: $calculator_cond.mu_symbol 
">>outputx.yaml && #else if str($calculator_cond.calculator)=="dftb": printf "dftb_set: $calculator_cond.dftb_set 
dftb_optionals: $calculator_cond.dftb_optionals 
dftb_pbc: $calculator_cond.dftb_pbc 
">>outputx.yaml && #else if str($calculator_cond.calculator)=="all": printf "uep_gw_factor: $calculator_cond.uep_gw_factor 
uep_chden: $calculator_cond.uep_chden 
castep_command: $calculator_cond.castep_command 
castep_param: $calculator_cond.castep_param 
mu_symbol: $calculator_cond.mu_symbol 
dftb_set: $calculator_cond.dftb_set 
dftb_optionals: $calculator_cond.dftb_optionals 
dftb_pbc: $calculator_cond.dftb_pbc 
">>outputx.yaml && #end if ln -s outputx.yaml output.yaml
tool.help:
usage: pm-muairss [-h] [-t {r,w}] structures parameter_file
Given an input structure, generates a set of structures with a muon added in a random location.
